item.title: Recent advancements in reinforcement learning
item.description:
Description

#11 PyData Warsaw

We will start with a short overview of reinforcement learning and its recent success stories. Next we will go deeper into a few interesting latest results and areas of active research. In greater depth we explore such concepts as curiosity driven exploration, automatic goal generation and navigating in complex environments.
